projects.title: FlashMind
projects.summary: A flashcard-based web application for repetitive learning
features: Learning mode to aid memorization through repetition
contribution: Integrated database and authentication using Supabase
Managed global state and learning flow with Zustand
problemSolving: Applied Supabase RLS to securely fetch user-specific data
Resolved Zustand initialization mismatch in SSR to prevent hydration errors
learning: Simple yet effective state management using Zustand
Role-based security and access control in Supabase

projects.title: Over The Glass
projects.summary: A real-time subtitle service for the hearing-impaired using AR glasses
features: Conversation Mode: Display subtitles around the speaker in a chatroom
Conversation History: Record who said what during a conversation
Video Watching Mode: Identify speaker in videos and show subtitles accordingly
contribution: Led the team and implemented frontend of the AR application
Analyzed open-source specifications and example codes for unfamiliar technologies such as AR glasses, Flask, Dlib, and STT
Implemented speaker-position-based real-time subtitles using understanding of networking, image processing, and 3D coordinates
problemSolving: Used mutex to prevent stack overflow during image processing
learning: Unity AR Foundation and UI rendering

projects.title: Duktown
projects.summary: Community-based information sharing app for dormitory life
features: Provides dormitory-related information and applications (e.g., overnight stay, repair requests)
Community and delivery group matching with chat functionality
contribution: Implemented community page with post CRUD and UI
Built user profile page to view and edit information
problemSolving: Improved user experience by modifying API requests based on query parameters and syncing state with URL
Implemented infinite scroll using `ref` and `onScroll` to enhance pagination
Defined enum-like object for category-based filtering (e.g., Delivery, Daily Life, Marketplace) and mapped them to API requests
learning: Designed structured dynamic routing using React Router and hooks like useState/useEffect
Learned access control via RESTful API and token-based auth using localStorage
Gained experience in user-centric UI through conditional rendering, scroll events, and useRef

projects.title: Time.zip
projects.summary: A self-development web app for commuting students and free time
features: Curates self-development content like newsletters and video lectures
Community section for student information sharing
contribution: Implemented features to add and edit schedules
problemSolving: Resolved bugs in time management logic
Solved issues with real-time updates in notification feature

projects.title: Focus Up
projects.summary: Gamified routine management app to enhance focus and sense of achievement
contribution: Developed REST APIs for home screen, character screen, my room, and shop using Spring Boot
problemSolving: Resolved synchronization issues with routine data
learning: Backend development with Spring Boot and MySQL + JPA
